17
18#define DB_NONE (0x000)
19#define DB_BASIC (0x001)
20#define DB_VERBOSE (0x002)
21#define DB_JOBS (0x004)
22#define DB_IMPLICIT (0x008)
23#define DB_MAKEFILES (0x100)
24
25#define DB_ALL (0xfff)
26
27extern int db_level;
28
29#define ISDB(_l) ((_l)&db_level)
30
31#define DBS(_l,_x) do{ if(ISDB(_l)) {print_spaces (depth); \
32 printf _x; fflush (stdout);} }while(0)
33
34#define DBF(_l,_x) do{ if(ISDB(_l)) {print_spaces (depth); \
35 printf (_x, file->name); \
36 fflush (stdout);} }while(0)
37
38#define DB(_l,_x) do{ if(ISDB(_l)) {printf _x; fflush (stdout);} }while(0)
39
